data.description: How to use chi-square, analysis of variance, simple and multiple correlation and regression analysis, and various nonparametric tests in communication research.
data.title: DATA ANALYSIS IN COMMUNICATIONS RESEARCH

data.description: Introduction to research methods in the communication industry. Overview of all stages of the research process and of translating data into reports for strategic communication recommendations for clients, ranging from industry to policymakers.
data.title: RESEARCH METHODS IN THE COMMUNICATION INDUSTRY
